SEARCH
Package controller

Interface IKontrolleriForV

All Known Implementing Classes:
Kontrolleri
public interface IKontrolleriForV
The IKontrolleriForV interface defines the methods that a controller for the simulator should implement for the view. It provides methods for starting the simulation, speeding up and slowing down the simulation, resetting the clock, adding and removing services, adjusting the speed, and initializing data.
